name: Pacific Livestock Company
description: Pacific Livestock Company (PLBC) operates within the agricultural sector, specializing in the production and distribution of livestock and agricultural products. Founded in 1975, the company has established itself as a leader in providing high-quality beef and pork products to various markets across the United States. With a commitment to sustainable practices and animal welfare, Pacific Livestock ensures that its livestock are raised in humane conditions, adhering to strict quality standards. The company prides itself on its innovative approaches to livestock production, which include advanced breeding programs and sustainable farming practices. Through its extensive distribution network, Pacific Livestock supplies a diverse array of meat products to retailers, wholesalers, and food service operators. The company also invests in research and development to enhance productivity and efficiency in its operations. As consumer demand for ethically sourced and high-quality meat continues to grow, Pacific Livestock remains focused on meeting these needs while maintaining its core values of sustainability and quality. With a dedicated team of professionals and a strong commitment to excellence, Pacific Livestock Company is poised for continued growth and success in the agricultural industry.

seo.meta_title: Pacific Livestock Company | Quality Meat and Livestock Production
seo.meta_description: Explore Pacific Livestock Company, a leader in sustainable livestock production and high-quality meat products. Learn about our commitment to quality and sustainability.

faq.question: What does Pacific Livestock Company do?
faq.answer: Pacific Livestock Company specializes in the production and distribution of high-quality livestock and meat products.

faq.question: Where is Pacific Livestock headquartered?
faq.answer: Pacific Livestock is headquartered in Portland, Oregon, USA.

faq.question: When was Pacific Livestock founded?
faq.answer: Pacific Livestock Company was founded in 1975.

faq.question: What types of products does Pacific Livestock offer?
faq.answer: Pacific Livestock offers beef, pork, and processed meat products, as well as livestock such as cattle and pigs.
